channel.title: CVE Feed for Medtronic -- Paceart Optima
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Medtronic -- Paceart Optima

item.title: CVE-2023-31222|2023-06-29T15:24:24.829Z -- medtronic -- paceart%20optima
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data in Microsoft Messaging Queuing Service in Medtronic's Paceart Optima versions 1.11 and earlier on Windows allows an unauthorized user to impact a healthcare delivery organization’s Paceart Optima system cardiac device causing data to be deleted, stolen, or modified, or the Paceart Optima system being used for further network penetration via network connectivity.
